title: Portrait Photography Open Call 2025
theme: Human connection, emotion, and character in portraiture. Submissions should capture authentic moments that reveal personality, vulnerability, or powerful human stories. Both environmental portraits and traditional headshots are welcome.
pastWinners: Previous winners have featured compelling character studies with strong emotional resonance. Winning portraits typically combine excellent technical execution (sharp focus on eyes, flattering lighting) with genuine human moments. Subjects are often looking directly at camera, creating intimate connection with viewer. Cultural and ethnic diversity has been valued. Experimental approaches to portraiture and unconventional framing have also won recognition.
context: This competition seeks to celebrate the power of portraiture to reveal human dignity and complexity. Entries should demonstrate mastery of lighting, composition, and emotional connection. Both studio and location portraits are acceptable. No AI-generated or heavily manipulated images.

customCriteria.name: Emotional Impact
customCriteria.description: Does the portrait evoke feeling and create connection with the viewer?

customCriteria.name: Technical Execution
customCriteria.description: Lighting quality, focus accuracy, exposure, color grading

customCriteria.name: Originality
customCriteria.description: Unique perspective, composition, or storytelling approach

customCriteria.name: Subject Dignity
customCriteria.description: Respectful representation of subject, cultural sensitivity
